channel.title: marketing agency on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in marketing agency on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Edelman Logo
Edelman is an American public relations and marketing consultancy firm, founded in 1952 by, and named after, Daniel Edelman. It is currently run by his son Richard Edelman. As of 2018, it is the largest public relations firm in the world by revenue and with 6,000 employees. Edelman has a history of establishing astroturf campaigns for its clients. The company has provided services for the fossil fuel industry, which includes earning hundreds of millions of dollars to advocate on behalf of the American Petroleum Institute, a fossil fuel industry group dedicated to the advancement of climate change denial and blocking of climate legislation.
You can download theEdelmanlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Edelman
item.description: Edelman is an American public relations and marketing consultancy firm, founded in 1952 by, and named after, Daniel Edelman. It is currently run by his son Richard Edelman. As of 2018, it is the largest public relations firm in the world by revenue and with 6,000 employees. Edelman has a history of establishing astroturf campaigns for its clients. The company has provided services for the fossil fuel industry, which includes earning hundreds of millions of dollars to advocate on behalf of the American Petroleum Institute, a fossil fuel industry group dedicated to the advancement of climate change denial and blocking of climate legislation.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
doTerra Logo
dōTERRA is a multi-level marketing company based in Pleasant Grove, Utah that sells essential oils and other related products. doTerra was founded in 2008 by former executives of Young Living and others. The company and its representatives came under fire repeatedly for misleading claims that their products could help prevent or cure diseases such as cancer, autism, Ebola and more recently, COVID-19, even being the target of a warning from the Food and Drug Administration and the Federal Trade Commission.
You can download thedoTerralogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: doTerra
item.description: dōTERRA is a multi-level marketing company based in Pleasant Grove, Utah that sells essential oils and other related products. doTerra was founded in 2008 by former executives of Young Living and others. The company and its representatives came under fire repeatedly for misleading claims that their products could help prevent or cure diseases such as cancer, autism, Ebola and more recently, COVID-19, even being the target of a warning from the Food and Drug Administration and the Federal Trade Commission.

That’s why we help tens of thousands of podcasters, from the niche-iest indies to the largest media companies in the world grow their audiences. And we help advertisers understand and harness the power of audio by measuring their ads’ effectiveness, so the most engaging content gets rewarded. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Craft Logo
Craft is a supplier intelligence company helping organizations accelerate data-informed business decisions. Our unique, proprietary data platform enables supply chain and procurement professionals to discover, evaluate, and monitor suppliers and create stronger supply chain resilience by tracking thousands of real-time signals across millions of companies globally. The company provides comprehensive, complete supplier data and intuitive software tools delivering best-in-class monitoring and insight into global supply chains and market intelligence as well as facilitating better and more proactive decisions that minimize disruptions and risk.
You can download theCraftlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Craft
item.description: Craft is a supplier intelligence company helping organizations accelerate data-informed business decisions. Our unique, proprietary data platform enables supply chain and procurement professionals to discover, evaluate, and monitor suppliers and create stronger supply chain resilience by tracking thousands of real-time signals across millions of companies globally. The company provides comprehensive, complete supplier data and intuitive software tools delivering best-in-class monitoring and insight into global supply chains and market intelligence as well as facilitating better and more proactive decisions that minimize disruptions and risk.
